name: Treasure Jewels of the Cursed Souls
text: You can activate this card from your hand in response to an activation of a "Treasure" Spell/Trap, except for "Treasure Jewels of the Cursed Souls". You can send 1 monster you or your opponent controls to the GY; draw 1 card. You can banish this card from your GY: Reveal 2 "Treasure" cards in your hand, and shuffle them back into the Deck;  Draw 2 cards.
